vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Σήθ, ὁ (Heb. שֵׁת),
indecl.,
Seth (Gen.4:25): Luk.3:38.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.4.25;
son of: Adam (H0121) and Eve (H2332);
brother of: Cain (H7014B) and Abel (H1893);
father of: Enosh (H0583); also called Sheth (Ketiv: buttock) at Num.24.17;
§ Seth, "determined, granted [Ge 4:25]; restitution"
Seth, (Gen. 4:25f.) (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:38*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
塞特 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "補償"
亞當的第三個兒子，以挪士的父親 (路 3:38)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
塞特 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "补偿"
亚当的第三个儿子，以挪士的父亲 (路 3:38)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Sết «đền bù», «bồi thường», «người thay thế». con trai thứ ba của A-đam. Xem H8352
